content: Mobai's plan... was really well thought out.

If you can't feel any weight in life,
you'll just float away, right?

The tuition fees... they're quite hefty,
so I'll have to work hard and stay grounded
to save up money for now.

Though it's a bit different from the life I imagined,
saving up for rent and living expenses
is still a worthy goal in life, right?

Although the living expenses are a bit overwhelming,
as I save up Joy Rice,
I'm getting more and more used to the rhythm of life here.
